Welcome to JBox's documentation!
================================

**JBox** is an **Archival Software** with **in-line deduplication** and **compression** features,
intended to backup data into Object Storage ( **Swift** ) over internet.
It can be triggered by File System Watcher
or by Crawlerand  **sync between multiple clients** on the fly.
